title: Former Kazakhstan Intelligence Chief Alleges Putin's Kompromat on Trump
summary: Alnur Mussayev, ex-chief of Kazakhstan's National Security Committee, alleged that Vladimir Putin possesses comprehensive kompromat files on Donald Trump, including potential evidence of sexual crimes, financial misconduct, and connections to Jeffrey Epstein's network. Mussayev claims the files are strategically maintained to control Trump's geopolitical alignment rather than to expose him publicly.

sources.title: Assessing new allegations that Trump was recruited by the KGB
Ex-KGB Official Claims Putin Has a Secret Blackmail File on Trump

notes: Claims lack concrete public evidence as of September 2025. Multiple publications report the allegations, but no independent verification of kompromat files has been established.
